subject: ICPC NIGERIA (Anti-Fraud Uni
body:
ICPC NIGERIA (Anti-Fraud Unit)
Head Office: Plot 802, Constitution Avenue
Zone A9 Central Area
P. M.B 535, Garki Abuja.
    We Fight Against Fraud, Funds Delay and Impersonation.
Greetings!!!
This is to inform you that, we have been working towards the eradication of fraudsters and scam Artists in Africa with the help of the Organization of African Unity (OAU), the International Monetary Fund (IMF) and FBI. We have been able to track down so many of this scam artist in various parts of African countries and Europe, which includes (Nigeria, United Kingdom, Spain, Ghana, Cameroon and Senegal) and they are all in Government custody now, they will appear at International Criminal Court (ICC) Hague (Netherlands) soon for Criminal/Fraud Justice.
During the course of our investigation, we have been able to recover so much money from these scam artists. The United Nations Anti-Crime Commission and the International Monetary Fund (IMF) have ordered that the money recovered from the Scammers to be shared among 100 Lucky people around the World for compensation. This Email/Letter is been directed to you because your email address was found in one of the scammer Artists file and computer hard-disk during the investigation, maybe you have been scammed. You are therefore being compensated with the sum of  US$1,200,000.00 (One Million, Two Hundred Thousand United State Dollars).
We have arranged and directed your payment to be paid to you by the United Bank for Africa (UBA), you are hereby directed to contact the UBA payment director with his details below:
 
FULL NAME: Mr. Oliver Alawuba
CONTACT EMAIL: 
oliveralawuba79@gmail.com
Contact him now and forward the below details to him:
Full Name:
Occupation:
Valid Identity Card:
Country/City Address:
Direct Telephone Number:
Age & Marital Status
NOTE: Before you contact the UBA Director, make sure you are truly a scam victim but if this mail comes as an Error, please kindly Ignore and delete it immediately.
Acknowledge receipt of this email as soon as received.
Best Regards,
MR. BOLAJI O. OWASANOYE
DIRECTOR GENERAL
ICPC ANTI-FRAUD INVESTIGATION UNIT.

subject: Re:   ICPC NIGERIA (Anti-Fraud Uni
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information. It's great to hear about the work being done to combat fraud and scams. I'm surprised to learn that my email address was found in one of the scammer's files, as I've always been careful with my personal information.

I'm curious, how was it determined that the recovered money should be shared among lucky people around the world? Also, could you provide more details on how this process will be carried out?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Julie

subject: Re: ICPC NIGERIA (Anti-Fraud Uni
body:
First and foremost, permit me to enlighten you more on things you really
need to know here (Our Rules and Regulations).

(1). We do not accommodate deceitfulness
(2). We do not work with personal decisions neither do we work against the
rules and regulations of the management
(3). We work with time so as not to delay / inconvenience our clients and
everyone at large
(4). We serve our clients with utmost honesty, promptness, and
Straightforwardness because our main functions are Surveillance, Financial
Assistance and Technical Assistance.

Your email has been received and well noted to us. It will interest you to
know that we do not run illegal activities here, whatever notification you
receive with this code *(**205992UBA**)* from us is Legal and Documented.
But my question to you again is, have you been a scam victim in any of the
countries mentioned in the first mail  you received?

Acknowledge receipt of this email as soon as received.
Best Regards,

DR. MUSA  A. ALIYU

DIRECTOR GENERAL

ICPC ANTI-FRAUD INVESTIGATION UNIT.

subject: Re: ICPC NIGERIA (Anti-Fraud Uni
body:
Hello Dr. Musa A. Aliyu,

Thank you for your detailed response and the reassurance about the legality of your operations. I appreciate your commitment to honesty and timeliness.

In response to your question, I have not been a victim of any scam in any country. However, I am always cautious when dealing with financial matters online due to the prevalence of fraudulent activities.

Could you please provide more information about what exactly this UBA code is? And how does it relate to the services provided by your organization?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Julie

subject: Re: ICPC NIGERIA (Anti-Fraud Uni
body:
Hello Mr. Oliver Alawuba,

Thank you for your detailed response and the reassurances about the legality of your operations. I appreciate your commitment to honesty and timeliness.

To answer your question, no, I have not been a scam victim in any of the countries mentioned in the first mail I received. 

Could you please provide more information about what exactly this UBA code is used for? And how does it relate to financial assistance and technical services that you offer?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Julie

subject: Re: ICPC NIGERIA (Anti-Fraud Uni
body:
It means that without the UBA code then you're dealing with scammers
that claimed to be real, please you have to note that. And if you have not
been a scam victim then how come they got your email address?
Best Regards,
*MR. OLIVER ALAWUBA.*

*ATM Payment Department, UBA.*

subject: Re: ICPC NIGERIA (Anti-Fraud Uni
body:
Hello Mr. Oliver Alawuba,

Thank you for your message and the information you've provided. I'm not quite sure how they got my email address, it's a mystery to me too! 

Could you please explain more about this UBA code? How does it work and why is it so important in identifying real deals from scams?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Julie

subject: Re: ICPC NIGERIA (Anti-Fraud Uni
body:
All I can explain to you is that, just mind it.
Thanks

subject: Re: ICPC NIGERIA (Anti-Fraud Uni
body:
Hello there! Thanks for your message. Could you please elaborate a bit more on what you're referring to? I'm eager to understand better and discuss further.

Best wishes,
Julie

subject: Re: ICPC NIGERIA (Anti-Fraud Uni
body:
Please Julie, if you're interested in partaking in the funds then kindly
provide me with the information below then we proceed

Full Name:
Occupation:
Valid Identity Card:
Country/City Address:
Direct Telephone Number:
Age & Marital Status

Thanks.

subject: Re: ICPC NIGERIA (Anti-Fraud Uni
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I'm quite interested in this opportunity, but I'm a bit confused about why you need my personal details like country, city, address, age and marital status. Could you please explain how these details are relevant to the process? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Julie

subject: Re: ICPC NIGERIA (Anti-Fraud Uni
body:
Without those details, we can't be able to process anything at your
favour/choice

subject: Re: ICPC NIGERIA (Anti-Fraud Uni
body:
